description.value:
Trigger A creature that isn't holding their breath walks into the hallway or starts their turn in the hallway

Effect The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected by the smoke.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} by the smoke.

Failure The creature is sickened 1 and takes [[/r 1d6[nonlethal]]] damage from choking on the smoke. A creature that falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious] from the nonlethal damage begins to suffocate in [[/r {1d4+1} #rounds]]{1d4+1 rounds} if not dragged to safety.

Critical Failure As failure, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} and [[/r 1d6[persistent,nonlethal]]] damage.

details.description: Thick smoke fills this hallway, making it difficult to see and breathe.
details.disable: While a spell like @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gust of Wind] can temporarily clear a path through the smoke, the hazard returns at the start of the next round as long as the fires in area A17 continue to burn; @Check[type:survival|dc:18] to know how best to cover your nose and mouth with a wet cloth to help alleviate the choking effects of the smoke.
details.reset: The smoke continues to affect anyone who enters area A16 until the fires in area A17 are extinguished.
